channel.title: Game similar to WoW
channel.description:
I remember years ago my uncle had bought a game that was very similar to WoW but it was not online, it was single-player.
So.... does anyone know this game's name? I'm hoping to buy it in time.

item.title: Game similar to WoW
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

there some game called gigors… It’s not out yet and I don’t even know if i spelled the name right though.

Read full topic

item.title: Game similar to WoW
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:10, topic:434240”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=536958.msg3925963#msg3925963 date=1330218592]
So you won’t call your uncle because you haven’t seen him in a long time? That should persuade you to call him even more…
[/quote]

It would be weird, imagine being an uncle who hasn’t heard from someone in a long time. Probably don’t even think about them. Then he calls up wanting you to remember something for him, and doesn’t call again for a long time.[/quote]
I don’t really have anything to say to him, I’m not a talkative person.

Davidi2:

Well there is ‘Warcraft’… which is what WoW is based off of. It’s a RTS

Thanks, this is it.

Read full topic

Just call your uncle.

item.title: Game similar to WoW
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:10, topic:434240”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=536958.msg3925963#msg3925963 date=1330218592]
So you won’t call your uncle because you haven’t seen him in a long time? That should persuade you to call him even more…
[/quote]

It would be weird, imagine being an uncle who hasn’t heard from someone in a long time. Probably don’t even think about them. Then he calls up wanting you to remember something for him, and doesn’t call again for a long time.[/quote]

Yeah, that would be weird. But he could just call and talk, and then right before they say their goodbye’s, “Oh by the way, what was the name of that game you bought?”.

Read full topic

item.title: Game similar to WoW
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:7, topic:434240”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=536958.msg3925946#msg3925946 date=1330217220]

Well your description narrows it down a bit. I’ll just search through every purchase of every game store in the world, check if the person who bought it is an uncle, than find yours. Brb- doing it.

Wasn’t asking for anyone to search for it, just asking if anyone knew what it was.

My reason for typing that last statement was to say that you don’t have enough information for anyone to make a reasonable guess. Give information, or better yet, call your uncle and ask him.

I would, but he lives far away and I don’t see him often.

…So what, do you want to play that game or not?
[/quote]
Yes. I would like to replay this game, it seemed awesome when i first played it.[/quote]

So call your uncle! Or have your mom do it or something.

Read full topic
